raf_autenticated.bodyofthankyou: If your email address is on file with us, you will receive an email when a friend enrolls with your Referral Code.
raf_autenticated.emailbodyplaceholder: I'm very happy with my service from Ohio Natural Gas, and I think you will be too. If you sign up with ONG using the promotion codes below, we can both get a $25 Visa Reward Card . Not bad, huh?
raf_autenticated.popupfootercontent: The is a post-only message from Ohio Natural Gas. Please do not attempt to reply to this message. We would love to hear from you if you have questions. For assistance with your account, please contact us via phone or by e-mail at customerservice@ong.com
raf_autenticated.rafemailbody: Enrolling is easy. Either click the button below to enroll online, or give ONG a call at 1.877.850.6200 and provide the Referral Code and Promotion Code below. Your gas service won't be interrupted when you switch. Ohio Natural Gas experts will handle all the details for you.
raf_autenticated.rafemailsubject: Enroll with Ohio Natural Gas and we could both get $25
raf_autenticated.rafterms: * Subject to the Refer-a-Friend program ("RAF Program") rules and terms and conditions available at onlyong.com/refer. Existing Ohio Natural gas ("ONG") customers who refer one or more new customers to ONG using the RAF Program (each, a "Referrer") may earn a $25 Visa Reward Card for each new customer who: (i) enrolls on an eligible ONG price plan, (ii) provides Referrer’s Referral Code at enrollment, and (iii) begins burning gas on an eligible ONG price plan. Referrers must: have either an active or pending account with ONG when Referee begins burning gas; authenticate their ONG account and accept the RAF Program terms and conditions; and participate by using the communication methods provided (email, Facebook, and Twitter) at onlyong.com/refer and as specified in the RAF Program terms and conditions. Allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Maximum award: $500 in Visa Reward Cards per person / calendar year for all ONG Visa Reward Card promotional offers. Offer valid for qualifying enrollments processed by ONG between 9/1/2017 and 4/30/2018. Referrers may combine this offer with their pre-existing discounts and promotions. The Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer’s terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. © 2017 Ohio Natural Gas. All Rights Reserved.
